files.name: default
files.description: The normal map. There's forest on the center and sand on the side. You have to defeat enemy to win.

files.name: ForestHollow
files.description: In the center  of forest, there's a hollow for commanders to control.

files.name: River
files.description: Two commanders face each other on the opposite side of river. One defends his domain and the other tries to conquer.

files.name: NarrowRoad
files.description: Forest and swamp cover a crystal mine. There's only a narrow road that allow people move through.
